text: Nisakuba nahlukene nabafazi (benu), nabo bewaqgqibile amaxesha okuba balinde, musani ukubathintela ukuba batshatele kwakumadoda abebetshate nawo (ngaphambili) xa bevisisana bona ngendlela enovelwano. Le mfundiso sisiyalo kuye nabani na kuni okholwa kuAllâh nakwiMini yokuGqibela. Oko bubungcwele nobunyulu kuni. UAllâh Uyazi kanti nina anazi
